Inspection of accounting records by journalists and citizen journalists
	Section 26 of the Local Audit and Accountability Act 2014 (inspection ofdocuments etc) is amended as follows.
	In subsection (1) (persons who can inspect accounting records and relateddocuments) after “persons interested” insert “or any journalist”.
	After that subsection insert—
		“(1A)In subsection (1) “journalist” means any person who produces forpublication journalistic material (whether paid to do so or otherwise).”
Commencement, extent and short title
	This Act comes into force at the end of the period of 2 months beginningwith the day on which this Act is passed.
	This Act extends to England and Wales only.
	This Act may be cited as the Local Audit (Public Access to Documents) Act2017.
